Reviews.Title: Not Too Bad
Reviews.Author: george564
Reviews.Content: Great price from Amazon. If you plan on using for say a bedroom, or dorm, or something for the kids, it should work out fine. As is customary, the audio is not that great. Picture quality is acceptable. Would not recommend for gaming or home  theater centerpiece, but for $170, it fits the need for an occasional use set or if a budget dictates being frugal, it sure beats an old CRT TV.

Reviews.Title: Good Price Great Quality
Reviews.Author: Calvin Peoples
Reviews.Content: Great picture and sound, the only issue is when you use it as a monitior via HDMI Cable it tends to cut off some of the screen no matter what resolution you use, Though this is not an issue when watching tv and movies from a laptop.

Reviews.Title: yea, this tv works, alright
Reviews.Author: Daniel Moadel
Reviews.Content: it is nice, and while it is not the best tv ever, it's certainly worth the money - it's flat, and relatively big, and plays videos.

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the money.
Reviews.Author: Tony
Reviews.Content: I actually bought this to use in the construction of a video game cabinet. It is the perfect size for my project, and has a good picture.

Reviews.Title: Great tv!
Reviews.Author: Karla Mcqueen
Reviews.Content: This item is exactly what I wanted for an awesome price! I really like the fact that it is very light weight!

Reviews.Title: Love the TV
Reviews.Author: LaToya B.
Reviews.Content: Excellent product.  We have had a really good experience so far and we look forward to many years with our product.

Reviews.Title: good picture, poor sound quality
Reviews.Author: J. Anderson
Reviews.Content: poor sound, good if you are hooking it up to a sound source - but I doubt you are going to find much better sound out of a tv this price - Low price considered, this is maybe 4 stars...had I known sound would be this bad, I would have spent a little more money.

Reviews.Author: Richard Kimpell
Reviews.Content: For this kind of cash it is good to go use it as a monitor... no problems at all buy one

Reviews.Title: Great television!
Reviews.Author: Cathy Kreidemaker
Reviews.Content: Has been an excellent television,  bought it for our 14 year old to pmay video games on and he thinks the quality of the viewing is awesome. Grwat sound quality as well. I highly recommend this television.

Reviews.Title: It's exactly what you'd hope.
Reviews.Author: Beau
Reviews.Content: Bought two.  One from Amazon Warehouse and one from Amazon.  For a small TV in a bedroom, it's perfect.  The picture is great, sound is adequate, I hooked them up and they both worked... plus they were very inexpensive.Two nice little TV's shipped to my door for $340??  I'll give that 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Not Bad, But Definitely Not Great.
Reviews.Author: Jesse Hrehoruk
Reviews.Content: So i have had this TV for almost exactly 2 years now, and today it fried on me. The picture goes black after a few seconds of powering on, and will not turn off without unplugging it entirely. Up until it died on me, it was a decent 29'' TV with a solid picture and good sound, so there was really nothing to complain about considering the price is less then $200. It served it's purpose while it lasted. The fact that it only lasted 2 years is rather disappointing, but worked fine up until that point.Overall, this is an ok TV considering the price, but if you do make this purchase, i strongly recommend purchasing the 3 year warranty with it. Im not the only person whose Haier TV died sooner than expected.

Reviews.Title: Giftees love it!
Reviews.Author: Melanie26
Reviews.Content: My husband and I bought this for our 75 year old neighbors for the computer room, they purchased a second tv, different brand, for their kitchen and ending up returning it because it was not nearly as good quality as this one.  We've since ordered our neighbors a second one of these for their kitchen and they couldn't be happier with the picture and sound quality and the ease of use.  This is a great little tv for the money!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: maxferolus
Reviews.Content: I absolutely enjoy it you cant go wrong with purchaseing this tv..there were never any problems problems i had with the tv either ..really great overall

Reviews.Title: A very nice buy
Reviews.Author: Jerry
Reviews.Content: better pic than i expected, overall i'm pleased for the price. Cable hookup is awkward but thats a minor problem.

Reviews.Title: Light and perfect size
Reviews.Author: NetDoc
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect size for smaller space, light and dependable. Really have enjoyed having it in our in-law suite!  Loved it so much we purchased a second one for the basement by the pool table. The small profile makes it nice for a wall where you do not have a lot of room for the TV to hang out from the wall.

Reviews.Title: feel goog
Reviews.Author: Yisheng S.
Reviews.Content: love it, like it,good price,use friendly,suggest to buy,my mom so happy have this TV, image is sharp,color look good, buy buy.....

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: D. Williams
Reviews.Content: This television was a great bargain.  It is a nicely sized bedroom tv.  The picture is adequate, as is the sound.  It is super light and very thin.  Great to sit on a chest of drawers or bookcase.  That being said, it is a modern looking flat screen....very thin around the edges and is great paired with the Haier blu ray player.

Reviews.Title: save your money!!!even for the low price its garbage
Reviews.Author: donald w. guido
Reviews.Content: i purchased this tv only for the price...and i certainly got what i paid for ....to start the remote came with brand new dead batteries..replaced the batteries and it worked...the tv has a god aweful picture and  the tint is way off...after many hours of trying to adjust picture  i gave up......closest tv gets to right color/tint  setting is  pink faces...would make the perfect gift for an inlaw or someone you dont hear from often...lol

Reviews.Title: not a  bargain
Reviews.Author: charles p.
Reviews.Content: I received the tv in 2 days with my Prime membersahip. The base was fairly easy to assemble.  But the connections on the back are made for a child's hands and not that of an adult male.  A bit tight.I connected it fairly easily to my Cable television.,But there was a "tornado" shaped defect on the top 1/3 of the screen.  The tv worked but with the tornado.The picture is not bad but the sound is like a cheap pocket radio.I called Amazon and explained the sitration.  The agent was excellent.  She arranged to have a replacement tv shipped overnight with FedEx.Amazon is way above any other company in seervice and good, polite agents.  But save your money and do not buy aanything from Haier.

Reviews.Title: Sub-par
Reviews.Author: Blake
Reviews.Content: When I bought this tv it seemed like a good bargain, it was very easy to assemble, although the connections on the back were a pain to hookup due to limited movement room. However after using the tv for 20-30 minutes it became unresponsive to the remote and controls on the tv itself. After calling Haier and then Amazon and numerous troubleshootings, I exchanged the broken tv for another thinking, "There is no way I could have the same problem with 2 tv's."; wrong. The second tv I had lasted 2 weeks, but ended up with the same problem; so i just returned it and told them I don't want another. If I could give this 0 stars, I would, but I can't.

Reviews.Title: Great picture-Poor tuner
Reviews.Author: Monte
Reviews.Content: The Good: Beautiful, crisp and clear picture. Well worth the price. Works great as a computer monitor through the HDMI connection and I assume it will work just as good hooked up to Cable TV or Satalite TV with external tuners.The Bad: I receive TV over the air and the internal tuner has to be the worst I have ever seen. Slow response changing channels. Numerous programmable features available that don't work. The TV comes with no instructions for the features and the Haier website's link for instructions doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Disappointment
Reviews.Author: Catherine Jones
Reviews.Content: HaierTV I bought from Amazon was not compatible with Dish. Took TV for repair 2hrs trip and they told us it doesn't work with Dish. We spent time and money for fuel etc and had to send it back. Big disappointment.

Reviews.Title: Not that bad at all
Reviews.Author: Brian and Melanie
Reviews.Content: I am familiar with Haier from my upbringing in Denmark, as a matter of fact my very first TV was a Haier I went to Germany and purchased it with my own money made from a newspaper route, it is not a high end product but it is still a great deal for the price, previous reviewers are right, the speakers suck and sound tinny, but that is easily fixed by getting a pair of PC speakers from Walmart and plug them into the provided jack, sounds great now and I can spread out the sound so the tv sounds much larger than it really is.Speaking of large, despite the 29" compared to my inlaws 32" it looks just as big, we bought this for the bedroom to use with a media streaming box, it works great, so I am going to deduct 2 stars fr native sound but that is all, I know from the past that Haer is a durable product, I bought my first Haier when I was 11, when I moved to USA 20 years later I passed it on to my sister and it is still running.So for those who are hesitating to buy, the sound sucks but can be fixed to awesome for $11, the picture is fine, for the price you get a lot, but if you are picky spend the extra $50 and get yourself a 32inch name brand.

Reviews.Title: quick service
Reviews.Author: Galpinfordinc "camping girl"
Reviews.Content: Wiw thought it was going to take 4 days to get got it the next day! Just what I thought it would be

Reviews.Title: Do not buy Haier TV at all.
Reviews.Author: azndude
Reviews.Content: This Brand Haier is purely a crappy TV all around. Your Haier TV will go blank on you it will start with a snowy screen then in will turn to a black screen. The TV will not let you turn it off by the power button or remote. Holding the power button will not reset it nor holding the menu and power the same time will do nothing at all. Your Haier TV might work fine for a couple of months to a year. The first symtoms will be going snowy then blank then you cannot even power down. When that happens you are pretty much a** out. I should have bought the extended warranty on it but thought hey this is a brand new tv. The TV Sanyo I bought at Walmart in 2000 works like a champ to this day. That's why I decline the warranty. All in All ovoid this Brand Haier.

Reviews.Title: Not what i expected
Reviews.Author: Sallie Johnson
Reviews.Content: I returned tv, screen is too narrow, i thought tv would be bigger. This tv is very light. too small for my tv stand.

ProductInfo.Features:
RoHS compliant
Multiple A/V inputs, including 2 HDMI and 1 USB port
Music and photo file playback via USB port
ProductInfo.Name: Haier 29-Inch 720p 60Hz LED HDTV (LE29F2320)
